content: the magnolia cocoon shrug has been inspired by magnolia flowers the shrug can be worn over any outfit whether it is pants or pretty summer dresses it is cropped with a beautiful lacy pattern the pattern is made using v stitches and shells the pattern is a 4 row repeat can be followed easily by a beginner also this shrug is made in one piece from a single rectangle with no shaping minimal seaming is required to create armholes for this cardigan jacket skill level easy beginner friendly sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl material yarn any dk weight or weight 3 yarn can be used suggested stylecraft special dk premier yarns bernat softee yarn used by me nako cici bio shade 11454 fiber 100% antibacterial acrylic amount needed 189 202 240 255 292 307 355 372 389 g or 548 584 696 737 846
